questText: Defeat Biggie Hours in the colosseum with this peanut in your inventory. Don't drop it or it'll decay to dust in 5 seconds flat!

dialogueText: Next to the 1st mark I see frogs the 2nd mark I believe is located in a Doctors office and the 3rd is somewhere between the Gandioso Canyon and here.

questText: Help Dazey build a Sprout costume. You don't actually need a pea brain that was just him being a jerk.

Blame it on the Goblins.dialogueText: Go defeat some goblins and then go re-invite everyone from before! I bet they'll be more than happy to come visit without those goblins in the way!
